      • findAllByCoupons

        java.util.List<Coupon> findAllByCoupons(Customer customer)
        Find all coupons of a customer
        Parameters:
        customer - A customer to get all coupons of.
        Returns:
        All coupons of the requested customer.

      • findAllByCouponsAndCoupons_type

        java.util.List<Coupon> findAllByCouponsAndCoupons_type(java.util.Collection<Coupon> coupons,
                                                       CouponType type)
        Find all coupons of a customer that has the requested type
        Parameters:
        coupons - Coupons of the customer
        type - Type to filter by.
        Returns:
        A list of all the coupons filtered.

      • findAllByCouponsAndCoupons_priceLessThan

        java.util.List<Coupon> findAllByCouponsAndCoupons_priceLessThan(java.util.Collection<Coupon> coupons,
                                                                java.lang.Double price)
        Find all coupons of a customer with price less than or equal to requestedPrice
        Parameters:
        coupons - Coupons of the customer
        price - Price to filter by.
        Returns:
        A list of all the coupons filtered.

      • findByCustNameAndPassword

        Customer findByCustNameAndPassword(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String password)
        Find a customer by its name and password.
        Parameters:
        name - The customer's name
        password - The customer's password
        Returns:
        The requested customer.

      • updateCustomer

        @Transactional
 @Modifying
 @Query(value="update Customer c set c.password= :#{#customer.getPassword()} where c.id = :#{#customer.getId()}")
void updateCustomer(@Param(value="customer")
                                                                                                                                                                    Customer customer)
